channel.title: Amr Elsekilly
channel.description: Frontend Engineering Lead at Airalo. I also make OSS contributions, write blog posts, and create videos on YouTube about frontend web development and remote work.

item.title: Sending asynchronous requests after leaving a page
item.description: Most of us must have struggled in the past with sending asynchronous requests when a user decides to leave a page. Whether you're trying to send analytics data or sending a small application-specific data to the backend when the user decides to leave your page
item.dc:creator: Amr Elsekilly

item.title: Succinct/concise syntax for optional object keys in ES6
item.description: Did you ever need to type a condition to add a new key to your JS object? This article has an ES6 shortcut for you!
item.dc:creator: Amr Elsekilly

item.title: TMux saving the day in 2020 [A Step-By-Step Guide] ðŸ”¥
item.description: Throughout the years, tmux has been on the top of the productivity tools that I use on a daily basis. It allows me to manage multiple projects simultaneously with ease in the terminal.
item.dc:creator: Amr Elsekilly

item.title: What's this blog gonna be about?
item.description: I started that by creating my YouTube channel, and getting involved with the tech community in Egypt and the middle-east by providing mentorship, and contributing to the community on social media, events, etc.
item.dc:creator: Amr Elsekilly
